About

SecretBit Ventures (SBV) is an independent research firm with over a decade of experience in academia and industry. Our team brings together expertise in multi-party computation, homomorphic encryption, federated learning, differential privacy, and machine learning. We have worked with top research institutions and technology companies worldwide, developing solutions that protect sensitive data while enabling powerful analytics and AI capabilities.

Meet the core members of our team:

✎ Update Staff Members

    • Dr. Sameer Wagh
    • Founder & CEO
    • info@secretbitventures.com

    Sameer has over a decade of experience in privacy technologies, machine learning, and entrepreneurial ventures. He has over 20+ papers in top-tier venues with over 1000+ citations and multiple patents.

Contact us today to find out how we can help you. Your first consultation is free.
